company.tagline: The only end-to-end agent builder platform that unites IT & business
company.description: WRITER is where the world’s leading enterprises orchestrate AI-powered work. Our vision is to expand human capacity through superintelligence. And we’re proving it’s possible – through powerful, trustworthy AI that unites IT and business teams together to unlock enterprise-wide transformation.

events.title: WRITER signs on to the EU’s Code of Practice for General-Purpose AI Models
events.description: WRITER commits to the EU’s Code of Practice, ensuring responsible AI development and deployment.

events.title: Introducing Agent Builder
events.description: WRITER launches Agent Builder, a new tool designed for creating AI agents.

events.title: WRITER achieves ISO trust triad
events.description: WRITER sets a new standard for security, privacy, and responsible AI in the enterprise by achieving the ISO trust triad.

events.title: From execution to supervision: Scaling productivity with Action Agent
events.description: WRITER introduces the Action Agent, enhancing productivity through AI supervision capabilities.

events.title: From months to moments: IBM and WRITER’s AI solution modernizes healthcare communications
events.description: IBM and WRITER collaborate to modernize healthcare communications utilizing AI solutions.
